Title: Requires social services districts to maintain a waiting list of certain families applying for child care assistance
Summary: Requires social services districts to maintain a waiting list of certain families applying for child care assistance.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-z, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring social services districts to maintain a waiting list of certain families applying for child care assistance
